content:
I am a financial analyst and I need to analyze the historical rates of gold (XAU) for a specific period. Can you provide me with the daily rates for the period? It would be helpful if the rates are in USD and organized in a time-series format.
Begin!

name: supported_symbols_for_metals_prices_rates_api
content: {"error": "", "response": "{\"ADA\":{\"id\":\"ADA\",\"name\":\"Cardano\"},\"AED\":{\"id\":\"AED\",\"name\":\"United Arab Emirates Dirham\"},\"AFN\":{\"id\":\"AFN\",\"name\":\"Afghan Afghani\"},\"ALL\":{\"id\":\"ALL\",\"name\":\"Albanian Lek\"},\"ALU\":{\"id\":\"ALU\",\"name\":\"Aluminum\",\"unit\":\"per ounce\"},\"AMD\":{\"id\":\"AMD\",\"name\":\"Armenian Dram\"},\"ANG\":{\"id\":\"ANG\",\"name\":\"Netherlands Antillean Gulden\"},\"ANTIMONY\":{\"id\":\"ANTIMONY\",\"name\":\"Antimony\",\"unit\":\"per ounce\"},\"AOA\":{\"id\":\"AOA\",\"name\":\"Angolan Kwanza\"},\"ARS\":{\"id\":\"ARS\",\"name\":\"Argentine Peso\"},\"AUD\":{\"id\":\"AUD\",\"name\":\"Australian Dollar\"},\"AWG\":{\"id\":\"AWG\",\"name\":\"Aruban Florin\"},\"AZN\":{\"id\":\"AZN\",\"name\":\"Azerbaijani Manat\"},\"BAM\":{\"id\":\"BAM\",\"name\":\"Bosnia and Herzegovina Convertible Mark\"},\"BBD\":{\"id\":\"BBD\",\"name\":\"Barbadian Dollar\"},\"BCH\":{\"id\":\"BCH\",\"name\":\"Bitcoin Cash\"},\"BDT\":{\"id\":\"BDT\",\"name\":\"Bangladeshi Taka\"},\"...

I verified that "XAU" represents gold and can be queried. Next, I'll check with you about the desired time period for this query.

Please specify the start and end dates (e.g., YYYY-MM-DD) of the historical period you would like to evaluate for gold rates in USD format.

function.arguments: {"return_type":"give_answer","final_answer":"In order to proceed and provide you with the daily rates of gold (XAU) for a specific period, I require the timeframe input, such as the start and end dates (e.g., YYYY-MM-DD). Please share these details, and I'll bring you the results as soon as possible!"}
function.name: Finish
